rules_text:
Slipstream [i](This creature can't be blocked as long as only creatures with slipstream are attacking.)[/i]
Whenever Conchhorn Shinygrabber attacks, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a Treasure token.
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Conchhorn Shinygrabber gets +3/+3 and gains lifelink until end of turn.
